articles.author: Edwin Rios
articles.title: Anchor, first and oldest US craft brewery, to shut down after 127 years - The Guardian
articles.description: ‘Grandfather of American craft brewing,’ started in San Francisco in 1896, to end operations amid financial struggles
articles.content:
After 127 years, Anchor Brewing is no more.
The first and oldest craft brewery in the US, which started in San Francisco in 1896, announced on Wednesday that it would end its operations after it str… [+8642 chars]

articles.title: US inflation rises at slowest pace in two years - BBC
articles.description: Inflation rose by 3% in the year to June but US interest rates are expected to rise again.
articles.content:
The rate of price growth in the US dropped to its slowest pace in more than two years last month, helped by cheaper used cars.
